title: [Large-Scale] Lecture Recording Technology Strategies for Dental Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic dental education theories and practical training experience
context.additional_context: Application of Lecture Recording Technology Optimized for Smartphone-Based Learning Environments and Analysis of Learning Effectiveness

learning_goals: Smartphone-based lecture recording tools can be utilized to produce dental education content.
Recorded lectures can be designed as step-by-step learning modules for complex dental procedural skills.
Strategies for improving lecture recordings can be established by incorporating learner feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
